moves.1. e4: This was my first game after joing the gameknot. After awhile of no practice due to my work
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 d6 3. Bc4 Qf6: In his move of Queen, in my mind was he was he will try to mate me as early as he can...
moves.4. d3 h6 5. Nc3 c6 6. h3 Be7 7. Be3 b5 8: this move was always my favorite move..
moves.8... cxb5 9. Bxb5+ Bd7 10. Bc4 Qg6 11. g: here i was planning to capture his Queen... but that is obvious so he knew what to do..
moves.14... Bh4+ 15. Bf2 Bxf2+ 16. Qxf2 O-O: this is what im waiting for.. i knew that he will do that...
in my surprice, he sacrifice his 2 knight for my 3 phone and that makes his King naked on my attack..
moves.25. gxf5 Nxf5 26. exf5 Bxf5 27. Rf1 Kh7: here i admit that i did a big mistake...
